title: The 10 best sales you can shop this weekend
text:
The 10 best sales you can shop this weekend

Save big on cozy clothes and popular kitchen tools with these sales. (Photo: J.Crew / ThermoWorks)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

As we dive from the work week to the weekend, there's one thing on my mind: Shopping. Honestly, the weekend is the best time to shop. Not only do you have more free time on your hands, but retailers are aware of this, so they tend to put out better sales towards the end of the week. Right now, there are some incredible sales to shop from your favorite retailers like Anthropologie, Casper, Shutterfly, and more. Here are the best sales to shop right now.

1. 25% off everything: Anthropologie's AnthroDay sale

Save big on the hottest fall fashion and home decor. (Photo: Anthropologie)

Happy Birthday Anthropologie! To celebrate, the popular retailer is offering 25% off everything on their site. This is one of the best sales we've seen at Anthropologie and is the perfect time to amp up your fall wardrobe or get some cheeky home decor. The discount is automatically added to your cart and you have to be an AnthroPerks member to get it. But it's free to sign up—just enter your email and start shopping!

Shop the AnthroDay sale and save 25% on everything

2. Get a free gift with a purchase of a Nectar mattress

Have your most peaceful sleep yet knowing that you saved on a brand new mattress. (Photo: Nectar)

A good night's sleep goes hand in hand with a good mattress—and Nectar makes the best mattresses-in-a-box on the market. Right now, if you order a mattress from Nectar, you can get a free weighted blanket (worth $169) and two free premium pillows (worth $150). This is a great opportunity to upgrade your sleep even more while saving on something you were probably going to get anyway.

Get a Nectar mattress and get a free gift

3. Up to 80% off: Discounted All-Clad cookware

The Factory Seconds sale offers huge discounts on cookware, bakeware, and more. (Photo: All-Clad)

All-Clad makes high-end cookware that a home cook dreams about. They only problem is that it typically comes at an insane price. But right now, you save up to 80% off on pots, pans, roasting racks, lasagna pans, and so much more. The catch? These items are factory seconds, which means they're may be minor scratches or damaging in the packaging, so All-Clad can't sell them at full price. But if you're willing to look past these minor imperfections, you can score a great deal on incredible cookware for Thanksgiving and beyond.

Shop the All-Clad Factory Seconds Sale and save up to 80%

4. 15% off: One the best meat thermometers on the market

Get this incredible meat thermometer at a great price in this exclusive color. (Photo: ThermoWorks)

If you take grilling or roasting seriously, then you need Thermoworks Thermapen Mk4. It's one of the best meat thermometers out there and was the quickest and most accurate of all the thermometers we tested. It's typically wildly expensive at $100, but right now, you can get it for 15% off in the limited edition sky blue color. This discount makes it the perfect time to get one as a gift for the home chef or grill master in your life, or you can splurge on yourself to assure you don't wind up with a dry bird on Thanksgiving.

Get the Thermapen Mk4 in Sky Blue at ThermoWorks for $84.15 (Save $14.85)

5. Buy one, get one free at Carter's

Save big on fresh looks for your kids. (Photo: Carter's)

Need some new fall clothes for your little one? Carter's is offering an incredible buy one, get one free for hoodies, jumpers, and shoes doorbusters, which means you can get two sale items for the price of one. You can also get 25% off orders of $50 or more with the code FALL4ALL. Happy saving!

Shop the BOGO sale at Carter's

6. $90 off: The best coffee brewer on the market

As elegant as it is high-functioning, the Moccamaster is considered the best coffee maker money can buy. (Photo: Technivorm)

If you (or a loved one) really care about waking up to the best morning brew possible, then you need a Technivorm Moccamaster. This fancy coffee maker is handmade in the Netherlands and earned the title of the best drip coffee maker we've ever tested. It perfectly brews coffee at its ideal temperature between 196 and 205 degrees for the best coffee you'll ever make at home. At typically over $300, it costs a pretty penny. But right now, you can get the CDGT model for just $230 at Drop.

Get the Technivorm Moccamaster CDGT Coffee Brewer for $230 (Save $90)

7. Up to 70% off: Fall furniture from Wayfair

Refresh your decor during these big Wayfair sales. (Photo: Wayfair)

While it may seem like there's always a sale at Wayfair, the Fall Refresh Sale is perfect for updating your home for the season. The site is offering up to 70% off bedroom furniture, living room furniture, area rugs, lighting, and more. Basically it's everything you could need to give your space a nice refresh at a great price. If you're looking for more furniture and home decor savings, Wayfair is also hosting a Head-Start Holiday Sale and a Warehouse Clearout Sale.

Shop the Wayfair Fall Refresh Sale

8. Get $80 off four boxes from Home Chef

Get four meals for just $20 each. (Photo: Home Chef)

Trying to mix up what you're cooking for dinner? Home Chef is the best meal kit delivery service we've ever tested because it has high-quality ingredients, easy-to-follow recipes, and incredible meal options. Right now, new customers can get $80 off first four boxes (that's $20 off a box!) by following our exclusive link. We did the math and found that Home Chef comes down to $10 a serving, so it's like getting two meals free with each box.

Get $80 off first four boxes ($20 off/box) at Home Chef for new customers only

9. 40% off: Outerwear, sweaters, and more at J.Crew

Get cozy essentials at a great price with this sale. (Photo: J.Crew)

Fall is the time to bundle up in cozy sweaters and coats that make the cold weather almost bearable. If you need to add a few more into your rotation, J.Crew is offering 40% off outerwear, sweaters, boots, and more right now with the code BUNDLEUP. With these savings, you can treat yourself to a new peacoat or cable knit sweater. Plus, you can also save 25% off everything else.

Shop the J.Crew sale and save 40%

10. Save 50%: Almost everything at Shutterfly

Print out your most cherished photo memories with Shutterfly. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

Whether you're looking for a unique wedding gift or are finally getting around to printing out the pictures from your vacation, you can save big. Right now, you can get 50% off everything at Shutterfly, including personalized school gear, no promo code needed. Even better, you can snag a free 8 by 8 photo book witht the code FREEPB, so you can show off your memories from this year. This is our favorite online printing photo service, and you can also get free shipping on orders over $49 with the promo code SHIP49.

Get 50% off almost everything at Shutterfly

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
